NewsArticle.Title: 4.51 test server Shutting down tonight at 5:00pm PST
NewsArticle.Content:
The 4.51 Test Server is going to be shut down at 5:00pm PST today(02/26/02). We thank everyone who participated in this test. Watch the News Section for furthur updates on the implentation of 4.51 to the commerical server.
Thanks again!!
